trans-unit.source: Contains event arguments for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> activity handlers called at initialization of child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> instances in addition to when the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> instances are finished.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorChildEventArgs"></xref> class.

Object instance that represents the data/execution context associated with the current child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> instance executed through the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref>.
Child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> instance that raised the event.
Gets the child/template <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> instance that raised the event.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> class instance that represents the child activity of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> that raised the event.
Gets the current item in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> enumerable collection.
The data for this item is frequently used to initialize values in the data context of the current child activity instance.
The current item in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> enumerable collection.
